survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of our recent professional networking event to assess satisfaction, identify areas for improvement, and understand the impact of networking opportunities provided.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse attendee preferences. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear numeric ranges to quantify connections. This helps assess the event's networking effectiveness.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make during the event?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions allow for detailed, qualitative feedback. Keep the question neutral to encourage constructive responses.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving future networking events?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this networking event to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: A simple yes/no/maybe question helps gauge overall satisfaction and likelihood of word-of-mouth promotion.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this networking event to a colleague?
